com.evolveum.polygon.scim

Class ScimCrudManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.evolveum.polygon.scim.ScimCrudManager

  • public class ScimCrudManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the CRUD+L methods needed for interaction with the service provider.

    • Method Detail

      • logIntoService

        public org.json.JSONObject logIntoService()
        Used for loging to the service. The data needed for this operation is provided by the configuration.
        Returns:
        a json object carrying meta information about the login session.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectionFailedException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException

      • qeueryEntity

        public void qeueryEntity(java.lang.Object queuery,
                         java.lang.String resourceEndPoint,
                         org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.ResultsHandler resultHandler)
        Sends queries to the service provider endpoints to retrieve the queried information and processes responses which are handed over to the provided result handler.
        Parameters:
        queuery - The query object which can be a string or an Uid type object.
        resourceEndPoint - The resource endpoint name.
        resultHandler - The provided result handler which handles results.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException

      • qeueryEntity

        public ScimSchemaParser qeueryEntity(java.lang.String providerName,
                                     java.lang.String resourceEndPoint)
        Sends queries to the service provider endpoints to retrieve the queried information and processes responses which are handed over to the provided result handler. This method send queries only to the endpoints containing the schema information of the services resources.
        Parameters:
        providerName - The name of the provider.
        resourceEndPoint - The resource endpoint name.
        Returns:
        an instance of "ScimSchemaParser" containing the schema information of all endpoint.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException

      • createEntity

        public org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Uid createEntity(java.lang.String resourceEndPoint,
                                                                        ObjectTranslator objectTranslator,
                                                                        java.util.Set<org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Attribute> attributes,
                                                                        java.lang.Object attributeMap)
        Sends queries for object creation to the service providers endpoints. After successful object creation the service provider returns the uid of the created object.
        Parameters:
        objectTranslator - An instance of object translator containing methods for the creation of an json object out of an provided set of attributes.
        resourceEndPoint - The resource endpoint name.
        attributes - The provided attributes set containing information for object creation.
        attributeMap - A Map containing the dictionary which represents the resource schema.
        Returns:
        the uid of the created object.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectionFailedException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.UnknownUidException

      • updateEntity

        public org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Uid updateEntity(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Uid uid,
                                                                        java.lang.String resourceEndPoint,
                                                                        org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Sends queries for object update to the service providers endpoints. After successful object update the service provider returns the uid of the updated object.
        Parameters:
        uid - The uid of the resource object which should be updated.
        resourceEndPoint - The name of the resource endpoint.
        jsonObject - The json object which carries the information which should be updated.
        Returns:
        the uid of the created object.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.UnknownUidException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectionFailedException

      • deleteEntity

        public void deleteEntity(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Uid uid,
                         java.lang.String resourceEndPoint)
        Sends queries for object deletion to the service providers endpoints.
        Parameters:
        uid - The uid of the resource object which should be deleted.
        resourceEndPoint - The name of the resource endpoint.
        Throws:
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectorIOException
        org.identityconnectors.framework.common.exceptions.ConnectionFailedException
